parts.title: Part 1: Match the Root/Prefix/Suffix to Its Meaning

questions.meaning: Refers to the head or top part of something.
Relates to human beings or the study of humans.
Denotes something wrong, bad, or incorrect.
A verb suffix meaning to make or act.
Suffix meaning pertaining to or related to.

parts.title: Part 2: Use the Root/Prefix/Suffix to Guess the Word

questions.definition: To make something feel or look fresher, younger, or revived.
To guide or lead someone in the wrong direction.
To clear or remove trees from a forest.
To summarize or go over the main points again.
To view human beings as the most important aspect of the universe.
Someone who believes in or is obsessed with lycanthropy.
The act of surrendering or giving up.

questions.question: Write a sentence using one RE word, one DE word, and one -OID word.
questions.example: The student had to recapitulate the entire lesson after the professor decapitated the main points and left out the anthropoid similarities.

questions.question: Can you think of another word with one of the parts? Guess what it might mean.
questions.example: Decipher might mean to decode or figure something out, like removing a code (DE) to reveal its meaning.
